title: 247-Argentinian Folklore: Beast Tartare, Can't Go Far
itunes:title: 247-Argentinian Folklore: Beast Tartare, Can't Go Far
description:
This week, it's the story from Argentina about Senorita Maldonado. We'll learn that sometimes the beasts of the woods might be better than your cruel, micromanaging boss.

The creature is a shapeshifting water monster who has one rule for her spouse. Just one. Think he can go without breaking it? Yeah, neither do I.

--
